flavorText:
"We can't beat the necromancers in numbers or raw power. We must beat them with ingenuity and timing."
—Rannon, Vithian holdout

foreignData.flavorText: „Die Todesbeschwörer sind uns von der Anzahl und der reinen Macht überlegen. Wir müssen sie mit Scharfsinn in den richtigen Augenblicken erwischen." —Rannon, Vithianischer Ausharrer
foreignData.name: Abweichen
foreignData.text: Verändere das Ziel eines Zauberspruchs deiner Wahl, der nur ein einzelnes Ziel hat.

foreignData.flavorText: "No podemos vencer a los necromantes en cantidad o poder. Debemos vencerlos con ingenuidad y oportunidad." —Rannon, centinela vithiano
foreignData.name: Virar
foreignData.text: Cambia el objetivo del hechizo objetivo que tenga un solo objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText: « Nous ne vaincrons pas les nécromanciens par le nombre ou par la force brute. Nous devons les vaincre grâce à l'ingéniosité et la stratégie. » —Rannon, objecteur vithien
foreignData.name: Embardée
foreignData.text: Remplacez la cible du sort ciblé qui a une cible unique.

foreignData.flavorText: "Non possiamo sconfiggere i necromanti per numero o pura forza. Dobbiamo sconfiggerli con ingegnosità e tempismo." —Rannon, renitente di Vithia
foreignData.name: Spostare
foreignData.text: Cambia il bersaglio di una magia bersaglio che ha un singolo bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: 「数や素の力では屍術士には勝てないだろう。 機を見計らって、搦め手で倒さねば。」 ――ヴィティアの交渉人、ラノン
foreignData.name: 急転回
foreignData.text: 単一の対象を持つ呪文１つを対象とし、それの対象を変更する。

foreignData.flavorText: "Os necromantes nos superam em número e força bruta. Precisamos derrotá-los com engenhosidade e paciência." — Rannon, embargador vithiano
foreignData.name: Divergir
foreignData.text: Mude o alvo da mágica alvo que tenha um único alvo.

foreignData.flavorText: «Нам не победить некромантов ни числом, ни грубой силой. Мы должны одержать победу за счет изобретательности и правильно выбранного момента». — Раннон, витийский отказник
foreignData.name: Отклонение
foreignData.text: Измените цель целевого заклинания с единственной целью.

foreignData.flavorText: 「我们无法以数量或蛮力来打败死灵术士。 必得依赖智谋与时机。」 ～威西亚拒斥人拉农
foreignData.name: 方向偏离
foreignData.text: 为仅指定单一目标的目标咒语更改目标。

name: Swerve
originalText: Change the target of target spell with a single target.

rulings.text: Swerve targets only the spell whose target will be changed. It doesn’t directly affect the original target of that spell or the new target of that spell.

You don’t choose the new target for the spell until Swerve resolves. You must change the target if possible. However, you can’t change the target to an illegal target. If there are no legal targets, the target isn’t changed. It doesn’t matter if the original target of that spell has somehow become illegal.

If you cast Swerve on a spell that targets a spell on the stack (like Cancel does, for example), you can’t change that spell’s target to itself. You can, however, change that spell’s target to Swerve. If you do, that spell won’t resolve when it tries to resolve because Swerve will have left the stack by then.
If a spell targets multiple things, you can’t target it with Swerve, even if all but one of those targets has become illegal.
If a spell targets the same player or object multiple times, you can’t target it with Swerve.

An Aura spell on the stack targets the object or player which it will enchant upon entering the battlefield. Thus, an Aura spell is a “spell with a single target”, which means you may use Swerve to change that target. Doing so will cause it to enter the battlefield enchanting the new target rather than the original one.

text: Change the target of target spell with a single target.
